name: clifteta
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, wo(wa(w1, wn(w2)), wa(w3, w2)))
-| w0
-| wo(wa(w1, wn(w2)), wa(w3, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, wo(wa(w1, wn(w2)), wa(w3, w2)))
-| w0
-| wo(wa(w1, wn(w2)), wa(w3, w2))

comment: show d is the same as an if-else involving a,b. (Contributed by Jarvin Udandy, 20-Sep-2020.)
